interpretation:
The "nesting dolls" emoji represents the concept of layers and hidden depths. It suggests that there is more to a situation or person than meets the eye, and encourages you to delve deeper to uncover the hidden truths. This card can also indicate the need for protection and security, as well as the importance of maintaining boundaries and personal space. Keywords associated with this card include complexity, mystery, protection, boundaries, and layers.

In a reading, the "nesting dolls" card may suggest that you need to take a closer look at a situation before making any decisions. You may be only seeing the surface level and missing the underlying complexities. Alternatively, this card may indicate that you need to protect yourself and establish boundaries in your personal or professional life. It could also suggest that you are entering a period of introspection and self-discovery, where you need to explore the layers of your own psyche to uncover hidden truths and insights.
